svg.text: SOX Platform Setup Hierarchy: Multi-Layer Initialization Process
7 Sequential Setup Layers Required Before Any SOX Work Can Begin
SETUP COMPLEXITY: WHY SOX IMPLEMENTATIONS TAKE 6-12 MONTHS
SOX work without completing ALL prerequisite layers
Each layer depends on completion of previous layers
Each layer requires 2-8 weeks depending on organization size
Multiple feedback loops and revisions at each layer
‚Ä¢ AI model deployment ‚Ä¢ Apache Hop setup
SOX Program Leadership & Key Admin Users (System Admin + HR)
Corporate Hierarchy & Entity Configuration (SOX Manager + Finance)
Process Mapping & Risk Assessment (SOX Manager + Process Owners)
Control Library Creation & User Assignment (SOX Manager + Control Owners)
Testing Resource Allocation & Calendar Setup (SOX Manager + HR)
‚úÖ SOX OPERATIONAL WORK CAN NOW BEGIN
All Prerequisites Complete - Testing Cycles Can Start
Total Setup Time: 16-32 weeks depending on organization complexity
CRITICAL INSIGHT: Each layer creates the foundation for the next - skipping or rushing any layer causes downstream failures
